slot-configuration.description: default slot for about us page

html.body:
About Commerce Cloud

It all started with a series of observations: eCommerce merchandising and marketing innovation is what generates the revenue, yet most operations are spending 80% of their budgets simply maintaining current infrastructure. The pace of ecommerce accelerates daily, yet most operations are scrambling to stand still. Merchandisers and marketers are supremely frustrated, spending more time chasing outsourced providers and internal IT organizations, than actually merchandising and marketing their own businesses. There had to be a better way.

Customer Service

Here you will find answers to your questions about shopping at our online store, your order, payment options and more. Simply select from the categories below for you complete information.

html.body:
press releases



November 12, 2018
KIND REINVENTS REDUCED PORTION SNACK CATEGORY WITH NATIONAL ROLL-OUT OF KIND® MINIS GO >


August 1, 2018
KIND INTRODUCES KIND KIDS™ BARS WITH A PROMISE: KIDS WILL LOVE THEM OR PARENTS WILL GET THEIR MONEY BACK GO >


January 17, 2018
KIND ELEVATES PROTEIN BAR CATEGORY WITH FIRST GREAT-TASTING OFFERING MADE FROM REAL FOOD GO >


December 12, 2017
KIND SPARKS DEBATE ON VALUES AMERICA NEEDS TO REUNITE, ASSERTS THAT “NICE IS NOT ENOUGH” GO >

November 29, 2017
KIND AND MARS ANNOUNCE PARTNERSHIP TO BRING HEALTHY SNACKS AND THE KIND PROMISE TO PEOPLE WORLDWIDE GO >

October 17, 2017
THE KIND FOUNDATION WILL CONNECT ONE MILLION STUDENTS THROUGH A NEW TECHNOLOGY PLATFORM CALLED “EMPATICO" GO >

August 22, 2017
KIND ENTERS FRUIT SNACKS CATEGORY WITH INTENT TO COMBAT KIDS’ ADDED SUGAR OVERCONSUMPTION GO >

February 15, 2017
KIND SNACKS FOUNDER & CEO CREATES NEW ORGANIZATION TO PROMOTE PUBLIC HEALTH OVER SPECIAL INTERESTS GO >

August 9, 2016
KIND BECOMES FIRST NATIONAL SNACK BRAND TO PUBLISH ADDED SUGAR CONTENT ACROSS ITS PORTFOLIO GO >

May 10, 2016
FDA REVERSES STANCE, AFFIRMS KIND CAN USE “HEALTHY” ON ITS LABELS GO >

February 17, 2016
KIND SOLIDIFIES SUPPORT OF REGISTERED DIETITIANS WITH LAUNCH OF NEW NUTRITION COLLECTIVE GO >

January 28, 2016
KIND CREATES THE KIND FOUNDATION TO HELP FOSTER KINDER AND HEALTHIER COMMUNITIES GO >

January 7, 2016
KIND CONGRATULATES THE U.S. DEPARTMENT OF HEALTH AND HUMAN SERVICES AND U.S. DEPARTMENT OF AGRICULTURE ON RELEASE OF THE 2015-2020 DIETARY GUIDELINES FOR AMERICANS GO >

December 1, 2015
EMPHASIZING REAL FOOD AND WHOLESOME INGREDIENTS: KIND, WITH SUPPORT FROM PREEMINENT NUTRITION AND PUBLIC HEALTH EXPERTS, ASKS FDA TO UPDATE ITS “HEALTHY” DEFINITION GO >

November 4, 2015
KIND TO REDUCE ADDED SUGAR ACROSS FRUIT & NUT LINE AS PART OF ONGOING COMMITMENT TO NUTRITION AND TASTE GO >

September 6, 2015
START YOUR DAY KIND WITH NEW KIND® BREAKFAST GO >

March 6, 2015
A SUPER GRAIN TWIST ON CLASSIC FAVORITES – KIND® ADDS DELICIOUS NEW FLAVORS TO ITS AWARD-WINNING KIND HEALTHY GRAINS® BARS LINE GO >
